divs: Sighting Details I was going to my friends house on my scootergoing down the huge hill in my nieghborhood. I looked into the sky and saw anobject that was glowing the same shade of gold as the sun (no, it wasnt thesun). It was next to the sun so I suspspect that it was matalic and miror-like.I panicked, rode down to my friends house, told them what happened, and wentback to the hill. It was gone when we got back to the hill.
Summary: It was a gold hovering oval
trends: There have been no other sightings in Easley
This sighting has never been favorited.
